resources.string: VoiceTea is a Truebeans\' project ideated, designed and programmed by Bernardo Manfriani and Pietro Fanti.

The project is "no-profit". When we have managed to cover production costs, we will remove advertisements for all users. Below you can see how much we miss to reach this goal and help us with a small donation.\nThe bar may take some time to update.

VoiceTea is an application designed for theater students and, in general, for anyone who needs to understand how to modulate his own voice. Once started, the application will notify you when your voice has peaks of pitch that you should avoid, to help you understand how to modulate your pitch.
\u2022 No ads \n\u2022 Advanced settings \n\u2022 You will also contribute to the development of the app
